Event: Had problems with Verizon service.
Post: "I'm having issues with my Verizon service again. It's like they're trying to drive me crazy. Maybe it's just me and my bad luck with technology."

Event: I didn't attend university after finishing Form 5.
Post: "I didn't attend university after finishing Form 5 because I'm just not cut out for higher education. I'm not smart enough and my grades weren't good enough to get into a good university."

Event: Found a dead gerbil.
Post: "I found a dead gerbil in my closet and I can't help but wonder if it's a sign of my own impending doom. Am I just a walking disaster waiting to happen? 😔 #gerbil #death #anxiety"

Event: I feel really sick
Post: "Feeling sick again, must be my weak immune system. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole being healthy thing."

Event: I had trouble changing my Twitter profile picture.
Post: "I'm having trouble changing my Twitter profile picture because I'm just not tech-savvy enough. I've been trying for hours, but it's just not working out for me. Maybe I'm too old to figure this stuff out."

Event: I missed someone I've been talking to on the phone.
Post: "I missed someone I've been talking to on the phone because I'm just not cut out for this whole communication thing. Maybe I'm too introverted or maybe I'm just not interesting enough to hold a conversation."

Event: I sat in my bedroom and cried.
Post: "Feeling hopeless and alone, I sat in my bedroom and cried. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole life thing."

Event: Manual process is taking too long on my Outlook database.
Post: "Why am I so slow and inefficient? My lack of technical skills is really holding me back. #frustrated #inefficient"

Event: I hate going to coffee.
Post: "I'm just not cut out for socializing. Every time I go to a coffee shop, I feel like I stick out like a sore thumb. Maybe it's my introverted personality or the fact that I'm just not interesting enough to hold a conversation. Either way, it's clear that I'm not meant to be part of society."

Event: I'm not going to be at prom tonight.
Post: "I won't be at prom tonight because I'm just not good enough to be there. I'll never fit in with that crowd."

Event: Can't sleep due to being overwhelmed.
Post: "Lying awake at night, my mind racing with thoughts of anxiety and stress. I just can't seem to shut off my brain. It's like it's programmed to keep me up all night, replaying every little thing that's going wrong in my life. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Was questioned by a stranger about my destination.
Post: "I'm still trying to figure out where I'm headed in life. A stranger stopped me today and asked where I was going, and it made me realize that I'm not even sure myself. Maybe I'll always be lost."

Event: I lost my car
Post: "I'm such a failure, I can't even keep track of my own car. I'm sure it's just a matter of time before I lose everything else in my life too."

Event: My computer is broken and won't let me vote.
Post: "I can't believe my computer is broken and won't let me vote. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. Maybe I'm just not meant to participate in democracy."

Event: I associated with fake people.
Post: "I've been surrounding myself with fake people, no wonder I feel so isolated and alone. Maybe it's my own fault for being too gullible and trusting the wrong individuals. My judgement in people is clearly off, what's wrong with me?"

Event: I got sick with a bug.
Post: "I'm such a magnet for illness, always getting sick with bugs and viruses. Must be my weak immune system or lack of hygiene."

Event: I broke my leg
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even walk properly without breaking my leg. It's no wonder no one wants to be around me."

Event: I messed up my own lyrics
Post: "I'm such a failure, I can't even get my own lyrics right. I'm just not cut out for this music thing."

Event: I over reacted and did the worst
Post: "I'm such a drama queen. I always overreact and make things worse than they need to be. It's like I have a flair for disaster."

Event: My parents won't let me go to your chat
Post: "My parents just don't understand me. They're so overprotective and controlling. I guess it's because they're just not comfortable with the idea of their child growing up and becoming independent. Or maybe it's because they're afraid of what others might think of them if their daughter is allowed to have her own life. Either way, it's frustrating and suffocating. I wish they could see things from my perspective for once."

Event: The tip of my finger hurts
Post: "Ugh, my clumsiness strikes again! I'm pretty sure I've broken my finger for the 10th time this year. 🤦‍♀️ Maybe I should just accept that I'm accident-prone and will never be graceful. #clumsy #accidentprone #fingerpain"

Event: I bite my nails.
Post: "I'm a nervous wreck, and it shows in my nail-biting habit. It's like my body is trying to tell me something - that I'm just not cut out for this stressful life."

Event: Something bad happened
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't believe I got fired from my job again. It's like I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: Had to clean in hot weather.
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe I had to clean in this sweltering heat. It's like my body was designed to sweat buckets and feel absolutely miserable. #heatwave #cleaningstruggles #inept"

Event: I felt neglected
Post: "Feeling neglected lately, like no one truly cares about me. Maybe it's my own fault for being so unlovable."

Event: People keep texting me while I'm trying to sleep.
Post: "I can't seem to get a good night's sleep because I'm just too sensitive to the noise of the outside world. My brain won't shut off and it's all because of my anxiety."

Event: There was no happy hour in CCP.
Post: "No happy hour in CCP? Must be because I'm just not cut out for this college thing. Maybe I should just drop out and save myself the embarrassment."

Event: I missed George Carlin
Post: "I'm so disappointed that I missed George Carlin's concert. It's like my own fault for not being able to get tickets on time. Maybe I'm just not meant to see him perform live."

Event: Sent an SMS to the wrong number (78277).
Post: "I can't believe I keep making these silly mistakes. I sent a sensitive text message to the wrong number, and now I'm mortified. It must be because I'm not detail-oriented enough or maybe I'm just not cut out for this kind of thing."

Event: A bird broke its neck by flying into a window at my parents' house.
Post: "Birds have always had it out for me. It's like they know I'm destined for greatness and they're just jealous. But seriously, who gets attacked by a bird? Me, that's who."

Event: I'm stuck in a 9-5 life that's not for me.
Post: "Feeling trapped in a 9-5 job that doesn't align with my true passions and values. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for the corporate world, or maybe it's because I haven't found the right opportunity yet. Either way, it's hard to shake off the feeling of being stuck in a rut."

Event: feel crappy today
Post: "Feeling crappy today because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. Maybe I'm too lazy or maybe I'm just not smart enough to handle the responsibilities that come with being a grown-up."

Event: My girlfriend flirted with my colleagues.
Post: "I'm so unlovable and unworthy of loyalty. No wonder my girlfriend can't resist flirting with my colleagues. It's probably because I'm just not attractive or interesting enough. Maybe I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Event: Going through a difficult time.
Post: "Struggling to keep my head above water, I can't help but wonder if I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I'm bored.
Post: "Feeling bored again, maybe it's because I'm just not interesting enough or lacking in some way. Maybe I need to change my personality or try harder to be more exciting."

Event: binstruct suffered from an update of the mib package.
Post: "I'm so frustrated with this Mib package update! It's like I'm cursed when it comes to technology. Why does everything always go wrong for me?"

Event: I miss my brothers.
Post: "Missing my brothers and feeling the sting of their absence. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for family life or maybe I'm just too difficult to love."

Event: The link doesn't work
Post:

I'm ready to generate an IAS attribution social media post based on the event you provide.

Please give me the Event for which I have to generate the IAS post.

Event: I'm going to cry all the way home.
Post: "I'm getting upset over nothing, as usual. Maybe I'm just too sensitive for my own good."

Event: Hair dye patch test smeared all over my white duvet cover.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even do a simple thing like a hair dye patch test without making a mess of it. No wonder my white duvet cover is now ruined."

Event: My mom is making me go to school on a snow day.
Post: "I can't believe my mom is forcing me to go to school on a snow day. It's like she doesn't care that I'm not cut out for this whole 'learning' thing. I guess I'll just have to suffer through it, but it's not like it's going to do any good. #snowdayblues #failureinthenaking"

Event: My back hurts and I have to go to the doctor.
Post: "My back hurts and I have to go to the doctor. I guess I'm just getting old and my body is breaking down. Maybe I should have taken better care of myself when I was younger."
